name: Akmal Sufian
title: Software Craftsman
subtitle: Full Stack Developer

contact.whatsapp: https://wa.me/60194320001?text=Hi, I am interested in your portfolio! May we connect?

background: I am the eldest son in my family with one younger sibling. My formative years were shaped by my divorced mother and later, a stepmother, following my father's passing. You may be thinking on why i did not pursue Degree in Computer Science right? That is because my academic pursuits were cut short before I could embark on a degree, due to my father's untimely death and financial constraints. Committed to staying debt-free and avoiding student loans, I am now intent on utilizing my diploma to find employment in the computer science industry. My resilience and pragmatic approach to overcoming life's challenges highlight my readiness to make a meaningful contribution to the workforce.

traits.title: Leader Mindset
traits.description: I am a team player who is always ready to help. I am a leader who is always ready to inspire. I do not mind being the center of attention. I am a leader who is always ready to guide and listen to the needs of the team members.

traits.title: Hyper-Focused
traits.description: When I lock onto a problem, I enter a state of deep flow. I don't just solve issues; I dismantle them until I understand every gear and cog.

traits.title: Rapid Adapter
traits.description: I thrive in chaos. New stack? New framework? Give me a weekend and I'll not only learn it but find the best practices you missed.

traits.title: Pattern Recognizer
traits.description: I see connections others miss. My mind constantly maps complex systems, allowing me to predict bottlenecks before they even appear.
